headline: BrowserStack review
description: BrowserStack is a great product for manual and automated testing on a large number of devices. Read our review of BrowserStack - a browser testing tool.

offers.description: Automated testing (desktop and mobile, per month)

negativeNotes: Network latency is high, most prominent when scrolling or typing
Test reports are not generated for live tests
positiveNotes: Supports more than 3,000 devices and browsers
Automation workflows can be written in multiple languages (Java, JavaScript, C#, PHP, Python, Ruby, and Perl) and frameworks (Selenium, JavaScript Testing, Cypress, Playwright, and Puppeteer)
Screenshots captured during tests can be annotated in the dashboard
Chrome extension that opens the current URL in a live testing environment with a single click

author.name: Naman Singhal
author.description: Naman has a background in computer science and has published research with IEEE on predicting software bugs using machine learning models.

name: Browser testing tool
reviewBody: BrowserStack is a great product for manual and automated testing on a large number of devices. Integrations with other services make it a powerful tool, but latency can be high when live-testing devices and some newer OS releases are not immediately available.
